settings.title: 8x more breathable
settings.content:
The Octaspring® structure is not only 8x more breathable than most standard foam, it also creates its own micro-climate to regulate your temperature for cool, dry comfort all night long.

Inside the Octasprings is an Octavent™ air system which works to expel hot air and draw fresh cool air back in, reducing your body’s temperature by 3 degrees.

settings.title: Proven faster, deeper, longer sleep

settings.heading: Do I need to rotate my mattress?
settings.row_content: All designs in the Octasmart® range are made from premium materials that are both effortlessly durable and breathable, so there's no need to flip or rotate them.

settings.heading: Can the mattress cover be removed and washed in the washing machine?
settings.row_content: Yes, we've made the cover removable and machine washable at 40°C.

settings.heading: Will the mattress slide?
settings.row_content: The mattress is made with a unique non-slip material to prevent disruptive slipping.

settings.heading: What is memory foam?
settings.row_content: Memory foam is a revolutionary material which was developed by NASA for the space program to give astronauts additional support during take-off and landing. High density memory foam, like that used in our mattresses, was developed for use in the bedding industry because of its amazing pressure relieving ability. Memory foam reacts with the heat of your body, moulding to your body shape and giving you ultimate support and comfort for a really great night’s sleep.

settings.heading: What will memory foam do for me?
settings.row_content: Memory foam provides a very comfortable and supportive sleeping environment, free of allergens and dust mites. You can be confident in the quality and value that our memory foam products provide, and that you’ll get comfortable faster, fall asleep quicker, sleep deeper for longer and wake up feeling fully refreshed.

settings.heading: Will memory foam help with my back pain?
settings.row_content: Yes, memory foam moulds to the shape of your body, relieving pressure points and spreading the weight across your whole body. It allows for better spine alignment while you sleep and reduces the number of uncomfortable pressure points you sometimes experience with other mattresses and toppers. Whilst we cannot guarantee or make any specific claims as to the health benefits of Octasmart's memory foam products, we do know that they give a very comfortable and supportive night’s sleep.

settings.heading: Do you manufacturer custom made sizes?
settings.row_content: At present, we don't offer custom made sizes. However, we're always evolving and launching new products so please keep an eye on our website and social media channels for the latest updates.

settings.heading: Can I use an electric blanket on my mattress?
settings.row_content: No, we don't recommend using an electric blanket because over time it can have an adverse effect on the materials used inside the mattress.

settings.heading: What Is Octacell™ Technology?
settings.row_content: Octacell™ is a 3D modular comfort layer that is symmetrically divided across 10,000 air-filled cells that work as individual support points and provide unrivalled breathability. Its open-cell design allows for advanced airflow and cooling comfort for an extraordinary night's sleep with our OCTAsmart® Essentials mattress topper range. Octacell™ is a unique comfort innovation inspired by Octaspring® aerospace technology; our eight-sided patented foam spring that blends the comfort of foam and the responsiveness of a spring in a new technology now recognised as the best new comfort innovation in Aerospace. It has been used in OCTAsmart® and OCTAsmart® Luxury mattress toppers, and now our experts have reimagined it again for our OCTAsmart® Essentials collection, creating an Octacell™ comfort layer which provides the same level of essential comfort and support as the original technology, but with less material. The power of Octacell™ means that there are thousands of individual support points in the mattress topper, which practically work as individual zones, creating perfect support for your body. Thanks to the 10,000 individual support cells of our innovative Octacell™ technology, we have developed a mattress topper that responds instinctively with your body to support you and help avoid any unnecessary transfer of movement if you or your partner are restless sleepers.

settings.heading: Is The Octasmart® Mattress Environmentally Friendly?
settings.row_content: Our Essentials mattress are probably one of the eco-friendliest mattress toppers we have designed. Not only does our Essentials mattress range reduce our environmental footprint by 40kg of CO2 emissions for every mattress topper we make, but they also can be recycled. The difference this makes in CO2 emissions means that for every mattress we produce, we give back the equivalent of planting two trees to mother nature. Additionally, our OCTAsmart® Essentials products are free from harmful chemicals, emissions and are OEKO-TEX certified.

settings.heading: Why is keeping cool so important for getting a good night's sleep?
settings.row_content: Your body temperature naturally falls in the evening, signalling that it's time for bed. A lower temperature also tells your body to produce melatonin, the sleep hormone. There's no doubt that you get better sleep when you're cool and comfortable (not hot and sweaty). The American Sleep Foundation has even recognised temperature as the #1 disrupter of sleep.
